description:
If I do the following curl request: 

curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d th-Token: ${NOVA_TOKEN}" http://localhost:8774/v1.1/images/1/meta

I get the following response back:

< HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error
< Content-Length: 94
< Content-Type: application/json; charset=UTF-8
< Date: Thu, 09 Jun 2011 13:11:33 GMT
< 
{"cloudServersFault": {"message": "argument of type 'NoneType' is not iterable", "code": 500}}


This should probably be a prettier 400 error.
title: OSAPI: POST without data results in 500 error
